creator: fineman@alumni.cmu.edu
text:
When the <formatter> tag generates it's data, the name of the test given is the
same as the class. This means that if I use an explicit name in my test case,
that does not show up in the report. Note that sub-tests (in my case this is a
TestSuite) have their names show up properly.

FYI, this is for script driven tests so the test names incorperate tokens
indicating the test data that was used.
